player

Class RandomPlayerFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • player.RandomPlayerFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.PlayerFactory

    public class RandomPlayerFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements net.PlayerFactory
    The RandomPlayerFactory is an example of a PlayerFactory that creates a series of random players. By default it assigns a random AI to each of the colours except Blue, which is controlled by the GUI.
